Divine Messenger Lydia:
There are far too few.
Damn Victim Orbis, Cursed Guardian Of The Aurbis, Cursed Thrower Orbis, Damn Scientist Orbis, Cursed By An Ancient Hero Of The Aurbis, Damn Senior Scientist Orbis - by killing these monsters, you can collect the Damn Mucus. Bring 8 bunches.
Goodbye! Go to the Temple Orbis...
